rules_text: Gain control of target creature or artifact, untap it, it gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
[i]You may sacrifice a creature or artifact you own. If you do, draw two cards and lose 2 life. If you do not, Bogrunach, Unyielding deals 3 damage to target opponent.deals 3 damage to target opponent.
You get a emblem with “Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, conquer that player.” [i](Exile the top card of that players library. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and spend mana as though it was any color.)[/i][/i]
